value:
Money talks. Without it, people die.
Still...try not to lose your head over it.
There are more important things.

Promises are precious, but think
carefully before you agree to one.
It may come back to bite you.

You're a diligent one. I hope you're
not so hard at work that you forget to
take a break occasionally.

Flightless creatures... I never know
quite what to say. Do you need a lift
somewhere? No? All right, then.

What would you say this country is
best known for? I'd like to bring gifts
home to Nealuchi and Leanne.

I am Naesala, King of Kilvas. I was
asked by $Nf to
bring greetings, so...here I am.

I will survive, no matter what.
By these black wings, I swear it.

Good enough to keep up
appearances, I suppose.
Blast... How could I be so careless?

A generous employer, aren't you?
We'll get along just fine.

I am Naesala, King of Kilvas. I will lend
you my talents...so long as I am
properly compensated, of course.

You seem to take your work quite
seriously. What leverage must these
people have over you, I wonder...$k$pOh, relax. It was only a little joke.
As for my reason to fight? Simple.
Kilvas desperately requires funds.$k$pIn my country, mercenary work is the
best—and sometimes only—way to
keep the people fed.$k$pSelling one's services to the highest
bidder may be unsavory, but worrying
about your reputation is for the rich.$k$pThe people of Kilvas depend on me.
That is why I fight. You'll continue to
keep me well-supplied, won't you?
ふんっ
そらよっ！
うああっ！
参ったね…
Don't judge me too harshly.
I suppose I'll just have to kill you.
You're just unlucky.
I've no more use for you.
Poor judgment abounds...
くくっ
I am Naesala, king of Kilvas. But I am so much more than just the king of a poor island nation...
Hm? Whatever are you thinking? I don't come cheap, I'll have you know.
What do a few human lives matter to me? They're none of my concern.
Black wings—among humans these are considered bad omens, are they not?
For receiving my own royal assistance, let's see...double, no triple rates.
One of the good guys? Me? Your sense of humor is...well, let's just call it "unique."
Certainly, I'll assist you. But you'll owe me, of course...
Splendid.
That one? Really?
Cheer me on.
